column6: na Remalia ba Peka Israelhen no fowee kɔr Jerusalɛm dɛ wɔnye no rokɔko; naaso woenntum no."

column4: na ɔno nye ne man akoma tuu kɛsenara
column5: na hɔnho wosowee dɛ mbrɛ kwaa mu ndua wosow wɔ mframa enyim no."

column3: Afei si mu kɔ kehyia Ahaz
column6: wɔ etsifi nsutaae no ano a ɔwɔ ɔtanhofo kwa tsempɔn mu no;"
wɔ ngyantsia ebien a opun wusiw yi no ndua ebien no ntsi
column7: wɔ Rezin na Siria na Remalia ba no hɔn ebufuhyew no ntsi."

column10: na yɛnhyɛ Tabeel ba no hen wɔ mu:"

column3: na Damaskɔs tsir nye Rezin: Na obodu mfe eduosia enum no nna woebubu Efraim posoposo a ɔnnkɛyɛ ɔman bi bio
column6: na Samaria tsir nye Remalia ba no. Sɛ hom renngye nndzi a

column5: "Bisa EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn hɔ asɛnkyerɛdze bi; sɛ osian kɔ samanadze bun mu o
aso osuar ma hom dɛ hom haw nyimpa
column6: na afei hom bɛhaw emi Nyankopɔn so yi?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE nankasa bɛma hom asɛnkyerɛdze. Hwɛ
column5: a asekyerɛ nye: Nyankopɔn nye hɛn wɔ hɔ."

column3: ber a ohu dɛ ɔpow bɔn
column4: na ɔsan mu yi papa no."

column2: "Na ansaana abofra no bohu dɛ ɔpow bɔn na ɔsan mu yi papa no
column3: wɔbɛpa asaase no a hɔn isuro hɔn ahemfo beenu no egya."

column4: na w’egya fi do a ofitsi nda a Efraim tsewee fii Juda ho no ɔmmbaa da; mekyerɛ Asiriahen no."

column3: EWURADZE bɔbɔ nhwiroma afrɛ wansema a ɔwɔ Egypt nsutsen ano noho no
column4: na adowa a ɔwɔ Asiria asaase do no."

column3: na hɔn nyina abɛgyegye bɔnsa a osian kuronn no mu

column2: "Da no na EWURADZE dze oyindam a wɔabɔ no paa wɔ esuegya noho no a ɔno ɔnye Asiriahen no beyi tsir nye anan ho nhwi
"Na ɔbɛba dɛ da no obi bɛnyɛn ɔnantwiburwa na nguan ebien bi;"

column3: numfonsu dodow a wɔbɛma no ntsi
column4: obedzi numfonsudaa: na numfonsudaa nye ewo na obiara a ɔaka ɔman no mu no bedzi."

column2: "Na da no mu no ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: beebiara mbrɛ nkyɛ wenyinndua apem a odzi ndwetɛbona apem wɔ
column4: bɛdan nkɔkrɔw nye nsoɛ ara nko."

column2: "Egyen menaba nye egyen na wɔdze bɛba hɔ."
"Na akoko a nkyɛ wɔdze asɔw dɔw do nyina no
column4: wɔ nkɔkrɔw ɔnye nsoɛ ho hu ntsi
